snippet.title: Dominatrix Simulator: Threshold - 2020 Trailer [Patreon DeviantDev]
snippet.description:
Good things come to those who obey. Get involved: http://deviant.tech

Gameplay and cinematic trailer for Dominatrix Simulator: Threshold - a unique game that lets you experience VR in an entirely new way as you respond in real life to the commands of the Goddess and her Mistresses. Can also be played on keyboard and mouse.

The game has recently undergone a massive art revamp as we continue to develop the game and content, as well as a new emotion system and the ability to play with gender fluid settings.
